groups.name: Content
groups.description: Requirements related to the substantive content of the articles.

requirements.description: An article should start with a clear definition in the lead section.
requirements.reference: The first sentence of the lead should define what the scope of the article is.

requirements.description: For genes/proteins with a human ortholog, the lead should specify the protein and gene.
requirements.reference: "<recommended UniProt name> is a protein that in humans is encoded by the <approved HUGO gene symbol> gene."
requirements.when: Applicable for articles on genes/proteins with human orthologs.
